issue.title: [Python] linking 3rd party cython modules against pyarrow fails since 0.14.0
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-5856](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-5856). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Compiling cython modules that link to the pyarrow library, using the recommended approach for getting the appropriate include and link flags has stopped working for PyArrow 0.14.0.

 

A minimal test case is included in the attachments that demonstrates the problem.
